articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition was opened to commemorate the 15th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition are at least 180 photos under the titles "The Benefactor of Liberation Who Liberated My Country", "The Invincible and Iron-Willed Commander", "The Tender-Hearted Father of the People" and "Being Always Together on the Road to Bring about the People's Well-being".
					
					 "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung at the Time He Commands the Final Offensive Operation for Crushing the Japanese Imperialists", "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Addressing a Pyongyang Mass Rally Welcoming His Triumphant Return to the Liberated Country," "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Standing at the Tribune of Honor of the Military Parade of the Korean People's Army", "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Conversing with Combatants of the People's Army on the Front" and other photos deal with the undying revolutionary feats of the President who defeated two ferocious imperialisms in one generation and achieved the liberation of the country and its freedom and independence with his outstanding Songun revolutionary idea and leadership.
					
					 Also on display there are photos showing the President's personality as a peerlessly great man who built the socialist power of Juche on this land by making endless journeys of on-the-spot guidance, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven and his noble traits and photos depicting the majestic image of the President who conducted energetic activities to reunify the country and accomplish global independence.
					
					 Attracting the eyes of visitors are photos impressively dealing with the Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il who successfully carried out the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President and is leading the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation to victory.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of ministries and national institutions and officials and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Minister of Culture Kang Nung Su made an opening address.

articles.title: Documentary Film Shown
articles.content:
Documentary Film Shown
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- "To Hold the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem for All Ages", part 7 of the Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Is Immortal" was shown at the People's Palace of Culture on July 4 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The film impressively deals with the immortal leadership feats of Kim Jong Il who assisted the President with the noblest royalty and opened up the history of accomplishing the cause of perpetuating the memory of the President. 
					
					 It also edits historic facts that Kim Jong Il took measures to solemnly hold a funeral ceremony, a national memorial service and a 100-day national mourning and other functions overcoming the biggest pain caused by the greatest loss of the nation and that he made sure that the Kumsusan Memorial Palace was wonderfully spruced up as the supreme temple of Juche. 
					
					 Among those watching the film were senior officials of the party and the state, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: New stamp Issued
articles.content:
New stamp Issued
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A new stamp (one kind of sheetlet) carrying the images of President Kim Il Sung has been brought out in the DPRK.
					 The sheetlet includes the stamps showing revolutionary history of the President who devoted all his energies to the founding of a Party, an army and a state after the liberation of the country.
					
					 It is compiled with a postage stamp reflecting the benevolent image of the President walking along a lane across fields in the last days of his great life.
					
					 Printed in the sheetlet are the letters "Eternal Sun of Juche" and a picture showing the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the most sacred temple of Juche, and magnolia, national flower of Korea.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Statue of Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Statue of Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A total of more than 142.5 million people visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to him and at least 241,000 floral baskets were laid before the statue for the last 15 years.
					 Anti-Japanese veteran fighters, senior officials of the party, the army and the state, the Fatherland Liberation War veterans, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statue on the occasion of the significant holidays including the Day of the Sun and other holidays and anniversaries and paid tribute to him. On these days a lot of floral baskets were placed before the  statue on behalf of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA, organs at various levels and industrial establishments, farms and schools, etc. in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Over 136,000 compatriots in south Korea and overseas also visited the statue with ardent yearning for the father of the nation.
					
					 More than 393,000 foreigners including prominent figures of political and public circles and militaries of many countries visited the statue in humble reverence for the peerlessly great man who performed immortal feats for global peace and independence. 
					
					 Heads of parties and state and prominent figures of different countries sent floral baskets to the statue carrying their ardent yearning and humble reverence for him.

articles.title: Deepening Reverence of Humankind for Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Deepening Reverence of Humankind for Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The world progressives, with deep reverence, are praising President Kim Il Sung as the most outstanding politician of the 20th century, the father of all the people and the eternal sun.
					Their ardent yearning and respect for the President who had devoted himself to the country and the people and to the cause of global independence are reflected in the gifts, orders, medals and honorary titles that have been awarded to him over the last 15 years.
					
					A socialists' organization in Mediterranean Region, which comprises political parties and social organizations of various countries in the region, conferred its order 1st class on the President on July 17, Juche 83 (1994), noting that President Kim Il Sung who had made all efforts for the strengthening and development of the socialist movement and for world peace lives long in the minds of all people for his tremendous exploits performed for the times and history.
					
					The Socialist Progressive Party of Lebanon honored him with the highest order instituted by it for the first time on the occasion of the 100th day of his demise. The Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America decorated him with the "El Medie Ben Barca" Order, the highest order.
					
					Among the orders and medals presented to him by many countries and international organizations are the order "Contribution to Victory" of Russia, the "Sukarno Order" of Indonesia, the Commemoration Medal of the 90th Anniversary of the Great Socialist October Revolution and the Great Medal "Sun of the National Association of Writers and Artists of Peru".
					
					A tribe of Nigeria held a special function for holding the President in high esteem as the Chief of the Sun Tribe in April 1995 and sent the throne, garb, stick, necklace and others of the Sun Tribe Chief as gifts to him.
					
					Embossed on the throne made of rare wood are the letters praising the great leader Kim Il Sung as the sun of the tribe and the national emblem of Nigeria and on its backboard and props are a spear, sword and lion.
					
					Among the gifts are a box for office supplies, wood-work "Cart", gem-work "Tree of Hope", landscape and wood-work "Eagle", glass vase and ceramic plate sent respectively by the leader of the Thai Rak Thai Party, the foreign minister of the Kingdom of Thailand, the President of the Women's International Democratic Federation, a Polish delegation for the study of the Juche Idea and the Swiss Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					
					Silk banners and congratulatory messages came to the President in the year of Juche 94 (2005) from the chairman of the Nepalese National Committee for Recollecting the Great Leader Comrade
						Kim Il Sung, the Study Forum for SelfÔºçReliance of Nepal, the Kabre Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea in Nepal, the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, a delegation of the National Integrated Study and Research Centre of Nepal  and other organizations and individual figures of many countries.
					
					Overseas Koreans and south Korean people also presented their gifts to the President with all sincerity.
					
					He was gifted with a silk quilt, glass-work "Red Sun" and gold-work "Tok Islet" by the secretary general of the World Peace Federation and with a copper plate with an inscription of the text of the June 15 joint declaration by a delegation of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea.
					
					In 1997 when the year of Juche and the Day of the Sun were instituted the Piura City Council of Peru conferred on the President the certificate of honorary citizen and gold key of the city which are awarded only to the greatest man in the world.
					
					A ceremony was held in Damascus, Syria, in April 2002 to give the name "Kim Il Sung Street" to a newly built street. It made public the decision on awarding the certificate of honorary citizen of the city to the President and declared the opening of the street to traffic.
					
					The President was decorated in the year of Juche 97 (2008) with the titles of honorary citizen and the honorary district chief respectively by the Atuntaqui City Government of Imbabura Province, Ecuador and the Ccatcca District Office of Quispicanchis Province, Cuzco Region of Peru and with the title of honorary chairman by the Applied Ecology Institute of Peru.
					
					Noted scientific organizations and universities of Belarus, Peru and other countries gave the titles of honorary academician, professor and doctor to him and organizations including the Nepal Journalist Association decided to hold him as their honorary chairman and honorary special member.
					
					The Russian International Charity Fund "Protectors of Arts for the Century" inscribed the august name of the President dear to the hearts of all people in the Monument "Good Angel of Peace" and awarded the "Gold Ornamental Knife of Protector of Arts" and the sculpture "Good Angel" symbolizing the protector of arts for the century.
					
					On the occasion of the Day of the Sun this year, a Mongolian delegation presented a gift to him and, earlier to this, the Pampas District Office of the Tayacaja City in Huancavelica Province, Peru, decided to award the title of honorary citizen to the President.
					
					The above-mentioned events show vividly how warm and truthful the reverence of the world progressive people for the President is.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cape Verde
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cape Verde
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Pedro Pirez, President of Cape Verde, on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of its independence and the proclamation of its Republic. 
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms and sincerely wished the president greater success in his work for the development of the country and the prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Japan's Policy for "Sanctions" against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Policy for "Sanctions" against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago Japanese Prime Minister Aso, in a speech on the diplomatic policy, blustered that Japan would closely cooperate with neighboring countries to "put strong pressure upon north Korea" and take specific actions to impose financial sanctions upon it and conduct cargo inspection," raising a hue and cry over the so-called "nuclear and abduction issues."  
					 At talks held with puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak earlier, Aso let loose a string of reckless remarks underscoring the need to "maintain close cooperation between Japan and south Korea in a bid to force north Korea to dismantle its nukes" and the importance to carry out the UNSC resolution. 
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seem to calculate they can attain their goal if they build up a "system for cooperating in sanctions and pressure" upon north Korea and escalate the high-handed economic blockade and pressure upon it, but this is nothing but a ridiculous wild dream of a political pigmy.
					
					It goes on:
					
					 Japan is entirely to blame for having pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the present dangerous phase.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to drive the present crisis on the peninsula into catastrophe, far from feeling any responsibility for the grave situation.
					
					 This indicates that they are political hooligans who do not hesitate to harass the regional peace and security in a bid to realize their wicked political ambition.
					
					 Japan's policy for "sanctions" against the DPRK is touching off bitterer hatred against Japan among the servicepersons and people of the DPRK and reinforcing their determination to settle accounts with Japan, their sworn enemy, at the cost of their blood.  
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to roll back at once their illegal hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Settlement of Part-time Job Problem Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Part-time Job Problem Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Part-time workers affiliated to the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions called a press conference in Seoul on July 1, denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its misrule.
					 Speakers at the press conference said that part-time workers to be turned into full-timers after two years of employment have been reduced to jobless or exposed to threat of dismissal owing to the unpopular policy of the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Grand National Party".
					
					 Noting that the GNP, which has imposed severe sufferings on the part-time workers, is now behaving itself as a "protector of part-time job" in the "National Assembly", they charged that this treacherous party is using the part-time issue as leverage for gaining its interests.
					
					 They demanded that the "government" and the GNP bear responsibility for any possible dismissal, stop such hypocritical conduct as "protection" and turn the part-timers into full-timers as soon as possible.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Answers to Questions Raised by the Editor-in-Chief of the Indonesian Newspaper 'Media Indonesia'" was brought out in pamphlet by a printing and publishing house in Indonesia on June 30.
					 The work, published on September 1, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies the need to further develop the Non-Aligned Movement under the present situation and the important tasks for strengthening the movement.

articles.title: Reverence for Kim Il Sung Expressed in Mexico
articles.content:
Reverence for Kim Il Sung Expressed in Mexico
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism published bulletin titled "Everlasting Reverence" to commemorate the 15th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					The bulletin carried a picture of Kim Il Sung and an article which said:
					
					Nearly 15 years have passed since the demise of Kim Il Sung, President of the DPRK, but he is still receiving gifts, orders, medals and honorary titles from different countries of the world.
					
					Many valuable gifts presented to the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il are on display at the International Friendship Exhibition House situated in picturesque Mt. Myohyang, a scenic spot of Korea. Among them are lots of gifts the President received from foreigners, south Koreans and overseas compatriots after his demise.
					
					And in the Central Zoo and the Central Botanical Garden of the DPRK there are a large number of gift animals and plants presented to the President by different countries and international organizations after his demise.
					
					Kim Il Sung will always live enjoying the everlasting reverence of the world people.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK, Anti-Reunification Scheme Protested
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK, Anti-Reunification Scheme Protested
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, sent letters of protest to the U.S. and puppet south Korean chief executives and the UN secretary general on June 24 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 He in the letters cited data to disclose the illegality of the U.S. military occupation of south Korea and its true colors as a provoker of the Korean War.
					
					 He demanded that the U.S. withdraw its aggression armed forces from south Korea without delay and that the UN never allow the U.S. military presence in south Korea to go on under the name of the "UN forces" without any legal propriety but support the stand of the DPRK striving to achieve the country's reunification by peaceful means.
					
					 He urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to lend an ear to the voice of all the Korean people working hard to reunify the country in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and put an immediate halt to the suppression of progressive pro-reunification forces in south Korea.
					
					 The "government" should discontinue the war rehearsals for aggression on the DPRK it is ceaselessly staging in conspiracy with the U.S. and repeal its criminal decision to fully participate in the PSI at once, he held.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion fotografica en homenaje a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion fotografica en homenaje a Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 3 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la Exposicion Central de Fotos en homenaje al 15o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente
					 Kim Il Sung.
					En la ocasion fueron expuestas mas de 180 fotos bajo titulares de "Libertador de nuestra patria", "Invencible genial Comandante de acero", "Padre afectuoso del pueblo", "Siempre juntos en el camino para el pueblo", etc.
					
					 "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung cuando organizaba y dirigia la operacion de ataque final para aniquilar al imperialismo japones", "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung pronunciando discurso en el mitin de la ciudad de Pyongyang para dar la bienvenida al retorno triunfal de el a la patria liberada", "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung en la tribuna viendo el desfile del Ejercito Popular de Corea", "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung conversando en el frente con los combatientes del Ejercito Popular de Corea" y otras fotos muestran las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente           quien logro la liberacion, la libertad y la independencia de la patria al vencer a los dos imperialismos feroces en una sola generacion con su destacada idea revolucionaria del Songun (priorizacion militar) y direccion en virtud de ella.
					
					 Tambien, estan exhibidas las fotos alusivas a la sublime personalidad y nobles virtudes del Presidente quien construyo en el suelo patrio la potencia socialista del Juche emprendiendo sin treguas el camino de direccion sobre el terreno segun su maxima de vida "Iminwichon" (considerar al pueblo como el cielo).
					
					Las otras ponencias dan la imagen venerable del Presidente quien trabajo incansablemente para la reunificacion de la patria y el cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia en todo el mundo.
					
					 Se ven, ademas, las fotos que demuestran en escenas emotivas las hazanas de la revolucion del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien cumplio con brillantez la causa de eternizar al Lider y conduce a la victoria la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					 En el acto inaugural estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales e instituciones capitalinas y trabajadores capitalinos
					
					El discurso de apertura estuvo a cargo del ministro de Cultura, Kang Nung Su.

articles.title: Proyectado documental en homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Proyectado documental en homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 15 del fallecimiento (8 de julio) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fue proyectada el dia 4 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la septima parte del documental "Sera inmortal el gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung" intitulada "Para enaltecer de generacion en generacion al gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung".
					La cinta demuestra en escenas impresionantes las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien asistio con noble fidelidad al trabajo del Presidente y dio inicio a la historia de eternidad del lider.
					
					Recoge los hechos historicos de que el Dirigente hizo celebrar solemnemente la ceremonia de despedida, el acto central de condolencia, el acto central de recordacion a los 100 dias y otras actividades y guio la obra de rehabilitacion para acondicionar magnificamente el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan como sagrado lugar supremo del Juche soportando el inmenso dolor que le causaba el duelo nacional mas grande (fallecimiento del Presidente).
					
					Lo vieron los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Mas de 142 millones 500 mil rindieron homenaje a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Mas de 142 millones 500 mil rindieron homenaje a Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ATCC) -- En los ultimos 15 anos, acudieron a la estatua de bronce del Presidente             Kim Il Sung en la capitalina colina Mansu mas de 142 millones 500 mil personas y se depositaron alli mas de 241 mil cestos de flores.
					Con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril-cumpleanos del Presidente), otras fiestas y dias conmemorativos, los ex combatientes de la lucha armada antijaponesa, los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los veteranos de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (de junio de 1950 a julio de 1953), los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores de distintos estratos, los jovenes y ninos escolares le rindieron homenaje al Presidente tras colocar los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores.
					
					En ese periodo, fueron depositados muchos cestos de flores a nombre de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, las unidades del EPC, los organos a todos niveles, empresas, fabricas, granjas y escuelas en esta capital, etc.
					
					Mas de 136 mil coreanos residentes en ultramar y el Sur de Corea tambien rindieron tributo al Presidente, padre de la nacion.
					
					Igualmente, mas de 393 mil personalidades distinguidas de los circulos politico, social y militar de numerosos paises del mundo visitaron ese lugar para expresar su gran veneracion a ese gran hombre sin par quien hizo inmortal contribucion a la causa por la paz y la independencia del mundo.
					
					Entre los remitentes de cestos de flores se distinguen ademas los lideres de partido, los jefes de Estado y las personalidades renombradas de varios paises.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena la politica de "sancion" anti-RPDC de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena la politica de "sancion" anti-RPDC de Japon
 Pyongyang, 4 de julio (ATCC) -- Mientras cuestionaba en su reciente discurso sobre la politica diplomatica el supuesto "problema nuclear y de secuestro", el premier japones Aso dijo que "presionaria fuertemente al Norte de Corea" en estrecha cooperacion con los paises vecinos y "tomaria acciones concretas para la sancion financiera y el registro de embarques contra Corea". 
					 En el anterior encuentro con el traidor titere surcoreano Lee Myung Bak, el pronuncio tambien otros chismes como "es necesario mantener la estrecha cooperacion entre Japon y el Sur de Corea para forzar al Norte de Corea a renunciar las armas nucleares" y "es importante ejecutar la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU".
					
					 Al respecto, periodico Minju Joson publico hoy un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					 Los reaccionarios japoneses piensan que podrian alcanzar su objetivo si establecen el "sistema de cooperacion para la sancion y presion" contra la RPDC y recrudecen el bloqueo e impacto economicos.
					
					 Pero, esto no pasa de ser una ilusion ridicula de ese enano politico (Japon).
					
					 Este pais isleno; es el autor que llevo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la fase tan peligrosa de hoy.
					
					 Pero, en vez de sentirse responsables de ello, los reaccionarios japoneses actuan con mas locura para llevar a la explosion la actual crisis de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Este hecho demuestra que ellos son los bribones politicos que no vacilan en destruir la paz y la estabilidad de la region para satisfacer sus malsanas ambiciones politicas.
					
					 La politica de "sancion" anti-RPDC de Japon redobla el odio del ejercito y el pueblo de ella a este pais isleno y hace mas firme la determinacion de ajustar la cuenta con este enemigo jurado a precio de sangre.
					
					 Los reaccionarios japoneses deben abandonar de inmediato su ilegal politica hostil a Corea.
